Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors

Class MotorBuilder

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.MotorBuilder
public class MotorBuilder extends Object
A builder class for configuring and generating a TalonFXConfiguration for CTRE TalonFX motor controllers.

This builder provides a fluent API for defining motor behavior including PID, direction, feedback sensors, FOC, current limits, and software limits.

  • Constructor Details

    • MotorBuilder

      public MotorBuilder(MotorBuilder.RequestType requestType, boolean neutralBrake, boolean ccwPositive, double motorToMechRatio, double statorCurrentLimit, double supplyCurrentLimit, boolean isFOC)
      Private constructor for required parameters.
      Parameters:
      requestType - the control mode for the motor
      neutralBrake - true if motor should brake when idle
      ccwPositive - true if counter-clockwise is positive
      motorToMechRatio - motor-to-mechanism gear ratio
      statorCurrentLimit - stator current limit in amps
      supplyCurrentLimit - supply current limit in amps
      isFOC - true to enable Field-Oriented Control

    • withToMechanismRatio

      public MotorBuilder withToMechanismRatio(double mechanismRatio)
      Sets the gear ratio from the motor to the mechanism. Only applies if a feedback sensor is configured.
      Parameters:
      mechanismRatio - the ratio to set
      Returns:
      this builder
